name: Donate 75 Dollars
description: Donating is simple. 1. Choose the amount of your donation. All potrait drawings will be on acid free paper(19inx25.5in) unless otherwise specified, so your donation is soley depending on you. 2. Once you have made your donation, email/ mail your potrait to Mr. Varner to began your project. Photos should be clear and in good condition. If you you are mailing a photo, please address envelope: CHARLESFRANKLINS.ORG 3925 Oak St. EXT Suite 1106 Valdosta, GA 31605 If you are emailing a photo, send to: admin@charlesfranklins.org 3. Please email with any questions or concerns to the email address listed above. Allow 5-7 days for delivery. Thank you!

name: Donate MORE! (if you think the work is worth it)
description:
If you appreciate art and would like to donate more, feel free to do so with this option.  If you want to donate more than $500, just simply change the number of quanity at checkout.

Thank you to the clients that have previously donated more and thank you for the future clients/ celebs.



Donating is simple.

1. Choose the amount of your donation. All potrait drawings will be on acid free paper(19inx25.5in) unless otherwise specified, so your donation is soley depending on you.

2. Once you have made your donation, email/ mail your potrait to Mr. Varner to began your project. Photos should be clear and in good condition. If you you are mailing a photo, please address envelope:

CHARLESFRANKLINS.ORG

3925 Oak St. EXT 
Suite 1106 
Valdosta, GA 31605

If you are emailing a photo, send to:

admin@charlesfranklins.org

3. Please email with any questions or concerns to the email address listed above.

Allow 5-7 days for delivery.

Thank you!
